name: MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode
description: The MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode interface represents an audio destination consisting of a WebRTC MediaStream with a single AudioMediaStreamTrack, which can be used in a similar way to a MediaStream obtained from Navigator.getUserMedia().

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
